episodes.title: Why Do So Many Cults Start As Offshoots Of The LDS Church?
episodes.description: Tony Brueski and Psychotherapist and Author Shavaun Scott engage in a thought-provoking discussion about the tendency for cults to originate as offshoots of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church). They consider the LDS Church's doctrinal uniqueness, organizational structure, and history as possible factors that can foster such splinter groups. They also delve into the psychological aspects, explaining why certain individuals might be drawn to these more extreme interpretations and practices. Their dialogue illuminates the complex sociological and psychological dynamics that can lead to the creation of cults. Want to listen to ALL our Podcasts Ad-Free?
